instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Macbook A2289 820-01987 won't turn on
threads.message:
A cyclic reboot occurs on one of the ports. on the second hangs 5 V and 0.257-0.300 A. What to check ?

PPBUS_G3H=12.3v

[B]U3100[/B]

PP3V3_UPC_XA_LDO=3.299v
PP1V5_UPC_XA_LDO_CORE=1.58v
PPDCIN_G3H=5v

[B]U3200[/B]

PP3V3_UPC_XB_LDO=3.290v
PP1V5_UPC_XB_LDO_CORE=1.58v
PP3V3_G3H_RTC=3.3v
PPDCIN_G3H=5v

[MEDIA=youtube]idGVX5Hi_xU[/MEDIA]
[MEDIA=youtube]fyDrqeYCoa8[/MEDIA]

threads.title: Macbook A2289 820-01987 won't turn on
threads.message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Compare diode mode readings around CD3217 chips.
Pay atention to CC1/2 lines.

threads.title: Macbook A2289 820-01987 won't turn on
threads.message:
Thank you for your greeting, I hope our cooperation will be fruitful :).
U3100:
USBC_XA_CC1=0.553
USBC_XA_CC2=0.552
U3200:
USBC_XB_CC1=0.553
USBC_XB_CC2=0.553

threads.title: Macbook A2289 820-01987 won't turn on
threads.message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 103881, member: 682"]
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Compare diode mode readings around CD3217 chips.
Pay atention to CC1/2 lines.
[/QUOTE]
write the results of all measurements here or only those that differ on СD3217 chips?

threads.title: Macbook A2289 820-01987 won't turn on
threads.message:
I especially mentioned CC1/2; but I expected you to check more points around CD3217 chips.
You have different behavior on the ports, so possibly one chip is bad; or some adjacent component.
If both chips give similar readings, then you need to change them.

threads.title: Macbook A2289 820-01987 won't turn on
threads.message: You must compare readings, to detect some differences...

threads.title: Macbook A2289 820-01987 won't turn on
threads.message:
UPC_XB_SWD_CLK=0.013
UPC_XA_SWD_CLK=0.538

SPARE_UPC_XA_USB3_RP=0.682
SPARE_UPC_XB_USB3_RP=0.011

USBC_XB_SBU2=0.012
USBC_XA_SBU2=0.700

Thanks to your parting words, I understand that the U3200 chip (CD3217) needs to be replaced?
